description: After a video is imported into Lightworks, the VIX file is created. It will be located in the Lightworks "Material" folder with the same name as the imported video but with the VIX extension appended on to the end. If the imported video is named V23P65J.mts , the new file would be V23P65J.mts.vix .
NOTE: .LVIX files are the same as VIX files but are used for .MOV and .MP4 media files.
